Awesome game, they have very much improved since the beginning.  So much better than Friday the 13th.

Edit: F13th is pretty much dead.  This game still loves on as one of the best games to play with friends and the team does a great job fixing issues.  The community can be toxic, but that's any online game.

DBD это когда:
- В платной игре с платными персонажами подавляющее число косметики тоже является платным.
- Ты никогда не можешь быть уверен, что попадёшь по выжившему, потому что все проверки сервером делаются в пользу сурвов. В итоге звук удара есть, крик выжившего есть, удара нет.
- Твоего любимого маньяка занёрфят потому что он способен противопоставить хоть что-то олимпийским чемпионам по паллетлупу и людям с докторстой степенью в сфере генраша.
- Тебе вообще попадаются люди из пункта выше, хотя играешь ты средненько. И да, на воротах ты ещё успеешь убедиться в их квалификации как профессиональных тренеров, специализирующихся на приседаниях.
- Всё ещё помните про нёрф вашего любимого маньяка? Кстати, 90% его аддонов ничего не дают. В принципе, подавляющее большинство киллерских аддонов дают +0.9% к скорости чего-нибудь ненужного.
- Зато "золотой набор" перков сурвов меняется только при его пополнении, но не наоборот.

Game recently wiped over 200 hours of progress. I still play and would buy anything they throw at me, because the community as a whole is positive. 
           As a killer main, i've never come across a game where I HATE the opposition so much. From T-bagging after a dropped pallet, to lighthouse powered flashlights blinding you constantly, it will make you build a level of rage that you cant ever believe a video game would. But boy o boy, does it feel so good to finally get that one survivor that has been taunting you the entire game on the hook. It makes all the rage and frustration worth it. This game is one that I would gladly play from level one again and again.
Oyunu katiller firstperson, survivorlar thirdperson oynadığı için çok pis taşşak gece biliyorsunuz katille.Çok zevkli.

Really awesome ppl in this game that you can meet and have fun with. This game will give you good times and bad times but for me it most been good. I love this game so so much and I will prob continue love it. If you looking for a really good survival game you should continue looking but if you want a fun game for a good price get this. :D :D :D

Hands down the best survival horror multiplayer. Playing survivor or killer is a totally different experience and both are incredibly fun and addictive.

The Devs are great and love their game. They offer a lot of free content mixed in with paid content.

The community is overall good, despite what  some will say. The bottom line is there are toxic gamers in every community.
If you play cheap and use certain tactics, you may recieve some negativity at the end of the round chat. But overall playing mostly killer in my few hours I recieve a "GG" or other positive things along those lines.

Zu aller erst: ich mag Dead by Daylight, allerdings gibt es immer mehr Probleme die zu den alten dazu kommen. Bugs die seit Ewigkeiten im Spiel sind und immer wieder mal auftreten, werden nicht behoben, zum Beispiel: das Quest sich ändern, das Quest nicht abgeschlossen werden, auch wenn man sie erfühlt hat oder das man Quest nicht mehr tauschen kann, auch wenn man eigentlich tauschen könnte (und das sind nur die Quests). Trolle werden im Spiel nicht bestraft, so sind Camping und Disconnects an der Tagesordnung. Es gibt absolut nutzlose Killer, so ist der Killer die Hexe seit ihren erscheinen nutzlos (bis auf ihre Perks). Es gibt Perks und Mechaniken im Spiel die Camping unterstützen. Es werden einfach Perks ins Spiel geworfen die bestimmte Probleme beheben sollen, aber die Grundprobleme werden nicht geändert. Als Surviver kann man nicht mehr mit schleichen gewinnen, da es die Killerperks verhindern und man Juken (um Hindernisse mit Paletten und/oder Fenster rennen um Zeit zu gewinnen) muss. Neue Events und DLC's sind meistens so verbugt das man das Spiel nicht spielen kann. Ich mag dieses Spiel und hoffe das die Entwickler endlich mal etwas tun, aber solange sich das nicht ändert kann ich das Spiel nicht empfehlen
Игра классная всем советую в неё начало играть доволно много людей поэтлму с поисков игроков за мана проблем нет советую играть под вечер так как много людей начинают играть в нею. Игра отличная

Нас было 4 человека, 2 фонарика, 1 аптечка и 1 тулбокс. И вот настал момент загрузки игры, мы набираемся терпения и ждем, ждем, ждем, очень долго ждем. И вот мы загрузились на карте Ферма Колдвинда .Против нас попался убийца Доктор. Мы думали что выживать против убийцы легко и мы ошиблись. С самого начала у нас была тактика и мы ее придерживались. Мы в 3 должны были чинить один генератор, а человек с фонариком должен был отвлекать внимание на себя и тут что-то пошло не так как надо. Доктор сразу нашел нас и нам пришлось бежать врасыпную, куда глаза глядят. По какой то причине Доктор решил бежать за мной, наверное по причине в моей руке тулбокса. Я понял что главное не дать ему убить меня и своих товарищей. Тем временем они уже починили генератор и начинают ремонтировать другой, а я все еще бегаю от убийцы получая от него шоковую терапию, скидываю на него доски и перепрыгивая через окна. И вот настал момент когда остался 1 генератор для побега и тут он меня кладет на землю, поднимает меня на своё плечо и несет на ближайший крюк. В тот момент я понял, что он не даст моим товарищам спасти меня и попросил их просто открыть ворота и убежать. Так и закончилась игра против Доктора.

Вердикт: Я получил 13000 очков, 8 стаков Шоковой терапии и потерял тулбокс. =(

Unfortunately, the game is hard to balance for all. The game at lower ranks is very heavy for survivors. You will need a lot of time to understand how and where to run from the maniac. For the maniac to start playing it will be easier, harder, just have to learn to play the nurse and hillbilly. I recommend to start playing for the Ghost playing for him you will quickly understand how to find the survivors and understand about the place of their spawn.
When you begin to play for the maniac at high grades, prepare validol. Play party is a great stress, every second counts, and any mistake is generator. If you play really well, you need about 2 minutes to find, catch and hang the first victim. By this time you will have 2 of the 5 generators. This is provided if your victim won't jump at you from the shoulder with perk or his friend won't blind you with a flashlight. Let nature take its course. If the survivors are smart, you two run to start the remaining generators, and the third using the perk which gives invulnerability will go to save the victim. Together, they will come running to open the gate already and the remaining friends will have to block your body to keep you wounded. Well, prepare yourself that after the game, no matter how you played, you poured a bucket of gomno in 70% of cases. The appropriate people rarely meet, and this community what to do. Play against randomness are different, there is as lucky, or you SARSAT generators for 5 minutes, or gets a team of altruists, and the game will be more interesting. Without perks at the maniac slows treatment and repairing generators do nothing.
The game for the survivors is a simulator of repairing the generators. If you want to play stealth, and a maniac in General you will not see the entire game. Or you can be altruistic, to save everyone, to be substituted under blows of a maniac and run him around the Board in a circle.
The game is about surviving which always aching from patch to patch give more and more Goodies. To kill you, maniac need to hang you 3 times on the hook. For the game by selecting a certain set of perks, you can get up from the ground, as being in a dying condition, and even in two ways. Also you can jump from the shoulder of the maniac, there's a perk which you can use, sadunaite hit maniac, self, sprint, invulnerability, which is triggered after you or you're off the hook, and more. But! If playing a maniac who took advantage of giving fanshot, which is tied to the totem, triggered after repairing the five generators, you learn a lot about himself and his family after the game. There are also individuals who take rare offerings and items, and Lebanon, if they were caught. And at the same time, you have against all this play and their Liv you points not get, but they're all items will remain and will continue playing. And for that, they will be nothing.
You can also talk about finding the game. If you decide to play with a friend or friends, you'll have to be patient. The game will look a long time, and when you find it, many maniacs will establish from the lobby, if they do not like it. And the search will have to resume. Unfortunately, the game has many insecure maniacs. And again, blame the survivors who don't respect killers, having his face generators, Crouch in front of the Board, zoom flashlight, write a bunch of insults. Many just clog and stop playing maniacs. And these same people are then in the lobby and are looking for a game for 15 minutes. For maniac game takes place in a moment.
Also in the game you can stumble upon various bugs, but constantly working on it :)
Despite all of the above, this game start play is a lot of interesting sensations for you. And again! Be patient, because need to spend a lot of time to learn to play well. I recommend to play as the survivors and all the maniacs, to know the game and understand both sides.

I absolutely love this game, I had seen many Youtubers playing it, and wanted to try it out. 

  It's funny, actually, I bought the Doctor DLC right when i bought the game because I wanted Feng Min as a survivor. Yet, once playing, I played Nea up until 23 and switched to Meg. I've been with Meg for about 43 levels now, and I plan to stick with her, though I am still trying to level my Feng, her perks are, in my opinion the best in the game. 

  It just goes to show you, someone you might think you will enjoy, you really don't.. 

  I would definitely recommend this game, I tried to get my boyfriend to buy it so we could play together but he didn't. 

  I plan to most likely buy all the DLC for this game if possible in the near future.

Sadly I really wanted to play this game but it functions horribly, for me anyways, even with graphics set low and a decent inernet connection. Here's why: 

1. Took an excessive amount of time to find/start a session around 30 or 20 minutes if I was lucky
2. Took even longer to load the game once you've started it 30 or 40 minutes if I was lucky
3. Game lagged horribly whenever I was patient enough to even get in, to the point where it is unplayable.

3878 Stunden später mal ein Review.. 
Dead by Daylight war über die Jahre ein auf und ab. Nur mit dem neuen Patch 4.1.0 ging es so steil bergab wie noch nie zuvor. Das Bubba (Leatherface) ein Update benötigt hatte war klar und das haben sie in diesem Patch auch echt gut umgesetzt keine Frage.  Aber das sie einen Killer überarbeiten wollten, der meiner Meinung nach schon belanced genug ist, hat mir die Nackenhaare aufstellen lassen.. Da die Devs anscheinend einen Cooldown Fetisch haben musste der gute alte Hillbilly auch darunter leiden. Als nächstes darf dann der Trapper nurnoch alle 2 Minuten eine Falle aufstellen weil es natürlich viel zu stark ist, wenn er mit 5? Fallen die Map verschanzt.. Kappa! 

Als nächstes kommen wir zum neuen "Aura feature" - Was man sich dabei gedacht hat ist mir bis jetzt nicht gewiss.. Außer das die Auren von ALLEM aussehen wie geröntgt! Wie kam man auf die Idee Transparente Auren einzufügen?!?!
Mit Bbq ist es extrem schwer Survivor und Gen auseinander zu halten und als Trapper sieht man seine eigenen Fallen kaum.. GG Devs

Zu der Community braucht man denke ich nicht viel sagen, denn wie in jedem anderen Online Spiel geht es auch hier extrem toxisch zu. Du lernst einen neuen Killer und schaffst es nicht alle 4 zu töten kommt natürlich sofort im Endgamechat das "ez". Auch wenn man 3 gekillt hat und dann mal nett ist und dem 4 die Hatch zu geben kommt von dem auch nur ein "ez". Generell herrscht in der Community ein extremer Hass zwischen Killern und Survivorn. Wenn bei den Killern was gebufft wird heulen die Survivor und wenn bei den Survivorn was gebufft wird heulen die Killer.. Allerdings ist das Game immernoch unbalanced wenn man als Killer gegen eine Swf spielt.. Da hilft das ganze überarbeiten der Killer und Survivor nichts.. 
Meiner Meinung nach sollte man auswählen können ob man gegen Solo oder gegen Swf spielen will und der Killer dafür extra Blutpunkte etc bekommt. Denn hast du einen Killer die Ez geloopt werden kann hast du schon verloren und auf Rang 1 werden hauptsächlich immer nur die gleichen Killer gespielt. Nämlich: Nurse, Spirit, Huntress. Alles Killer die du nicht gut loopen kannst, damit man eine Chance hat. Man sollte alle Killer so anpassen das diese auch auf den "High Ranks" mithalten können... Allerdings hat der Rang schon lange nichts mehr zu sagen, da jeder Pleb auf Rang 1 kommt... 
Mit dem neuen Mmr System was kommen soll, soll sich das ändern aber das wird man dann sehen.. 

Zuletzt noch ein Bug der einen wirklich aggressiv machte. (Dieser betrifft allerdings nicht jeden, somit haben manche diesen und manche eben nicht) Es geht um den Rank Update Error. Dieser kam nach einem Spiel wenn man einen Rang aufgestiegen oder abgestiegen wäre. Man wurde aus dem Game geschmissen und musste seiner Gruppe etc neu beitreten. Hört sich harmlos an, war aber wirklich nervig wenn das an einen Abend 5 - 6 mal passiert... 
Und mit dem neuen Update kam nun auch der "Sync Error". Dieser Error kommt nach dem Spiel und dich schmeißt es auch wieder komplett aus dem Game. Allerdings ist das Offering (Opfergabe) die man mitnahm weg und auch die Blutpunkte die man in diesem Spiel gemacht hat, werden einem nicht gutgeschrieben. Somit spielt man eine Runde für nichts.. Absolut nichts..

Immerhin kommen fast wöchentlich neue Skins die dieses Spiel so viel besser machen! -.-

Ja ich gebe diesem Spiel einen Daumen nach unten, nicht weil ich es nicht mag, sondern weil die Devs im Moment mal wieder zu unfähig sind und absolut nicht auf die Community hören und mal wieder extrem viele Bugs einbauen die es fast schon unspielbar machen..

Dead by Daylight is very simplistic in that it's basically Hide n' Seek for Adults. The depth of this game is easy to learn, but the skill ceiling is very high. It's very apparent when facing a great Survivor or a great Killer vs a bad one. Great Survivors can juke around corners, duck out of sight, and vanish seemingly without a trace. Similarly, great Killers know what to look for and often kill 2+ Survivors, sometimes without letting anybody escape.

As with all games, Dead by Daylight is much more enjoyable if you can get a bunch of friends to group up with. Not everyone in this community is a team player, but those that are never leave a man behind. It's worth noting that you can still Rank up and Level up without winning the round. The Killer only needs to kill 2 Survivors to Rank up, while Survivors just need to fix generators and help out their team as much as possible. Even if you get Sacrificed, you can still "win" with a Rank up.

杀鸡这款游戏的确算是好游戏，当初是和大学舍友一起入手的游戏，也的确给我们开黑带来了很多乐趣。但是，我为什么不推荐这款游戏呢？ 第一，这款游戏的bug太多，我和舍友开黑的时候就经常遇见翻不动的板子、突然性的从天而降系列还有出了逃生大门也无法结束游戏的情况，这些多的我也不说了，希望官方会慢慢修复吧。第二，这款游戏有个小细节需要大家注意：每次结束游戏后，不能立马退出steam平台，必须等杀鸡同步完成，否则游戏所积累下来的血石学点都会消失，会回到你开始游戏之前的数据。好了，接下来我要说的第三点，是我个人遇到的最大的一个bug。我很长一段时间没玩游戏之后，有一天登录游戏看了一眼自己的账号，准备玩儿一把，可是由于特殊情况，我就没玩了，然后就退出了。后来再次登录之后，居然发现自己的账号全部都被清空了。对，没错！所有逃生者、杀手的等级和我所有积攒下来的血石血点全部都被清空了，简直就跟一个新账号一样（我希望不要有喷子过来BB，我不会无聊到买一个游戏空挂机80多个小时在游戏的菜单界面，然后借由此怼官方好么）。就是这样，游戏我是被官方逼得不得不退坑了。关于此事，我也希望官方能注意得到，还我一个公道可否，希望大佬们帮我把我的评测顶上去！真心感谢！（PS：本人平常很老实地游戏，段位最高也就到过15，麻烦不要有喷子又说什么我用外挂所以清空账号了！）

Играйте в DBD . Игре 4-е года и она по сей день актуальна. Правда на данный момент в ней так и присутствуют куча багов которые разрабы естественно фиксят  , но это не проблемма . Игра классная в некой форме атмосферная , ну вообщем скажу так что плюсов больше чем минусов. кто не согласен со мной мне плевать.......

各位新手玩家，玩这个游戏一定要注意以下几点
因为会让你的账号被封停！
也许有些你并不认为这样会被封号，但是这真的会被封号！
用SAM修改游戏的成就 - 成就修改【永久封禁】
利用第三方软件刷血点，皮肤。更改文件获得皮肤。 - 非正常获取皮肤and存档作弊【永久封禁】
在游戏内挂机 - 挂机【永久封禁】
利用第三方软件作弊开挂 - 其它作弊【永久封禁】
骚扰辱骂恐吓别人包括其它交流平台 - 恶劣性质的言语【短期封禁】
屠夫放人，或者针对一个人不停破坏游戏体验，或者故意让游戏无法结束 - 帮助对手故意给对手送分，捣乱【短期封禁】
不要拔线次数过多 - 无游戏精神【短期封禁】
不要坑队友比如挡窗挡板 - 恶意游戏行为【短期封禁】
不要恶意卡，宣传BUG - 滥用游戏BUG【短期封禁】

4 survivor ve 1 katil ile oyuna başlıyorsunuz. Oyun içerisinde ''Kill your friends'' bölümünde arkadaşlar arasında oynayabiliyorsunuz (en az 2 en fazla 5 kişi) fakat kill your friendste oynadığınız oyunlarda tüm özellikler (perk, offering, add-ons) açık oluyor ve elbette size kazandırdığı hiçbirşey olmuyor puan vs. Oyunun oynanabilirliği ve grafikleri hakkını veriyor. Taktiksel ve deneyime bağlı bir oyun. Oyuna beni bağlayan diğer yanı ise elbetteki bir amacı var karakterlerinin her birine seviye kasıp bu seviyelere göre özelliklerini (perk) açabiliyorsunuz. Ayrıca oyunda rankta kasabiliyorsunuz, ben oyunlarda ranklara önem veririm ve rank olayı beni bu oyuna bağlayabiliyor :D Ve rank kastıkça rankızın kaç ise takım arkadaşınız ve katil sizin rankınıza göre geliyor ve birazda olsun toxic insanlara karşı kanser olmaktan kurtulabiliyorsunuz.

İlk çıktığı zamanlar patlayıp çok sevilip sonradan oyunun yüzüne kimsenin bakmadığı çok konu alınıyor, fakat şuan bile oyun içinde fazlasıyla oyuncusu bulunuyor. 

Oyunun elbetteki bir kaç kötü yanı var olmuyor değil;

Oyun içerisinde katillerin sizi yere düşürüp hooka (kanca) astıktan sonra başınızda bekliyorsa tamamen kanser olabilirsiniz çünkü sizin aslında 3 kere asılma hakkınız var 3.de ölüyorsunuz fakat ilk asıldığınızda  hooka asıldıktan sonra takım arkadaşlarınız sizi hooktan indiremezse belli bir süre sonra ölüyorsunuz elbette. Biz bu katil arkadaşlarımıza CAMPER diyoruz. Bu şekilde katil başınızda bekleyince takım arkadaşınız sizi alamıyor ve puan kasamıyorsunuz bu sebepten dolayı rankta düşüyorsunuz. 
Başka bir örnekte ise bazı katiller oynayamıyorsa baktı ki kaybediyor ben rank alamıyorsam kimse almasın diyip quit atabiliyor ve yine rank düşüyorsunuz :D Bu kişileri reportlasanız bile report sisteminin hiçbir işe yaradığını gerçekten düşünmüyorum. Dbd'ye özel birşey değil bu aslında çoğu oyunda oyuncu kaybetmemek için reportlamaları pek önemsemiyorlar. Ama bu oyunda böyle şeylere önem vermeleri lazım bence ki zaten oyunun SORUNU tam olarakta bu.

Kısaca Toxic insanlar haricinde eğlenceli gördüğüm oyundur kendisi.

7.27日更新

再次更新的时候我已经是1k8小时的玩家了，挺感慨的。
我曾经真的非常热爱这款游戏，不管是时间还是金钱都投入了真的非常非常多，也因为这款游戏变成了一个真正的网瘾少女。
但是怎么说呢，“粉转黑”吧，黎明杀机太让人失望了。

一次次执意削弱人类，把玩家意见至于不顾，官博一开始还安抚说会考虑玩家意见，但制作组仍然在众多人提意见反对的情况下实装了跑步暂停CD。
我曾经推荐这款游戏是因为它是非常精良的“1V4非对称竞技游戏”，但现在我看不到它的竞技性，只有毫无意义的屠杀。不需要脑子，只要你选择的人物是屠夫，不论你玩了多久，2000小时的人皇你想让他死他就得死。
太无趣了，令人厌倦。看不到磨练技术的意义，甚至觉得还坚守人类玩家初心的非常可笑。

我知道我在这里说什么都没有用，。但是现在我是这款游戏的黑粉，所以，每当我心情不好（比如打排位输了），我就打开黎明杀机无脑上顶配红处，遇到车队上护士，让人类开一台电机就算我输。
当然，如果你给了黎明杀机差评，那我们就是朋友。

—————————————————————————

1k小时玩家，主玩人类。
推荐点主要在游戏竞技性和人与人之间的互动性。

[b]这是一个可以有故事、有感情的游戏。	[/b]
也许你刚入坑，还是个会被心跳和乌鸦惊吓的小萌新。但是你被砍倒后，可能会有善良的农场主背着你丢到一个有风声的地窖口，慈爱地看着你离开。
也许你刚入坑，不知道修电机不会遛屠夫。但是你上树后，队友不离不弃拼命救下来，给你拍个82年的紫针，在门口即使自己倒下也要替你扛刀。
等到你慢慢熟悉操作，知道绕圈放板、知道无敌三圈，第一次在屠夫追赶下活过三台电机。
你开始逐渐发现游戏真正的竞技乐趣，与网线另一端的屠夫玩心机、套路与反套路，顶着贴近的心跳，面不改色地思考能让自己活得更久的路线。
你买了光头、摸了很多手电，在YY里笑着安慰妹子“不要怕让我来”
你逐渐习惯了每局吃个绿处，或者屠夫看到你就换了个护士（…
即使最后被当做邪灵的祭品，你依然无所谓地笑笑，因为你保护了其他三个队友，让他们活了下去。
你成为了一位人皇。

刚开始玩屠夫的时候，总会不知道“我是谁我在哪”“这人类怎么砍了一刀就不见了Σ(ŎдŎ|||)ﾉﾉ”
后来你学会看脚印、看乌鸦、追血迹、听呼吸，甚至仅仅是直觉——人类在你面前无所遁形。
你熟悉LT双窗的破解套路、你倒着走藏红光、你转身蓄力刀。
当然，你还学会了玩（狗）护士，两台电机内四趴简直家常便饭。
你成为了一名屠皇。

但是竞技游戏永远不能保证百分百的胜利，人皇翻车习以为常，屠皇（只要不是护士长）偶尔也会被骚光头调戏。
不过只要你始终抱着娱乐的心态去玩，出来和对方聊聊天。
告诉被你遛五台的萌新屠夫“没关系，你玩得不错，多加油练习就好”
告诉被你挂上树的人类玩家“你支撑了很久了，很厉害”

联机游戏氛围怎么样取决于玩家心态，国区的小伙伴如果能放宽心态，这个游戏会吸引更多人入坑。


[b]有关平衡性	[/b]
黎明杀机制作组似乎一直在试图强调“我们是个恐怖游戏！不是竞技游戏！！ ٩(✘д✘๑;)۶ ”
因此人类在持续削弱，屠夫在不断增强。
个人认为，杀戮机制刚出的版本，是对人类和屠夫玩家来说都最平衡的版本。
然而现在人类已经越来越难，遛鬼的乐趣成为更少数人的乐趣，更多普通人类玩家只能修机、捉迷藏和一旦被发现就尖叫上树。
不过竞技游戏的乐趣正在于磨炼技术，并且只要肯多练习，你一定能成为人皇屠皇的。毕竟我是个天生的游戏菜鸡，别人800小时可以达到双皇水平，我差不多用了1000小时，还不会玩（狗）护士。
但是在这800~1000小时中的乐趣和刺激感，真的远超其他百元以内的游戏。
另外，除了电锯和小叮当这类必须吃配件的屠夫，希望屠夫玩家能更少用顶配和处决，多多考虑一下空手散排人类的游戏体验。
萌新人类入坑最好找老人皇带队，尤其是在月初段位重置的时候，不然会很快被虐待出坑的。

[b]有关bug	[/b]
习惯就好。
杀鸡里各种各样奇妙的bug也是游戏乐趣之一啊（？）
翻不动板子是因为卡输入法，不是bug，再次按下 Ctrl+空格 就可以解决。
说实话，现在游戏里的bug真心不多了，早一年来玩确实会碰到超级好玩的bug，现在总觉得有点遗憾...
当然恶意利用bug除外，那是玩家素质问题。

[b]有关丢档	[/b]
并不像负评里那么严重，制作组已经在修复，并且丢档后可以联系制作组补偿，不是什么大问题，多花点时间点血网而已。
而且丢档是因为你自身网络不稳定造成的，我前800小时都没有出现任何问题，搬家后因为网线有问题经常掉线，才出现了丢档。
黎明杀机贴吧里面有手动备份存档以及丢档后联系制作组补偿的方法教学，自己做好就不会出现任何问题了。


总体来说，黎明杀机是款很有趣的多人联机非平衡竞技游戏，又刺激又搞笑，偶尔还有一点温馨…玩久了还可以收获一大票gay友和妹子。推荐入手。
Super Spiel mit langzeit Spielspaß. Hat noch einige Bugs auf Lager, aber welches Spiel hat das nicht?

Love the mechanics behind this game, At the beginning when this game first came out I wouldn't have recommended it. Dont even get me started on how horrible it was in the beginning....

Now the devs are sorting their shiz out Its actually enjoyable. Like any game that introduces new content aka killers, champions, survivors, whatever the list goes on and on. IT WILL BE BROKEN. Yes there are testers and beta alpha whatever. At the beginning it will always be the same until they issue a nerf to the said introduced killer by taking away certain perks or adding time to how long a cooldown is whatever. Its to be expected. 

The gameplay with friends is awesome, to choose to save your friend or leave them as the killers new christmas ornament  can be decided as a tatic to get things done or saving them just to waste the killers time chasing you as his new play toy he wants to catch, while the one you just saved has another chance at life and escaping. Hell there are four of you, take turns lol.

Theres so much you can do in this game and its a new experience everytime. Yes you get a handfull of killers that love to make this game a living nightmare but at the end of the day even if you rage, youll find yourself coming back for more hiding or running.... or even killing.

Even if you had a bad day as a survivor you can switch to killer and play with your food. Never will I say that being the killer is boring. If you know you have a premade team of 4 come into your lobby you know at the bottom of thier hearts they will want to save their friend. Use that. Bait them. But for the love of god dont be a camping asshole. Go to the nearest genie or make a quick permiter check thats out of the heartbeat radius of the hooked survivor so he can tell his friend to come and save him. Then.... Stab his new frisky friend in the back. The chase, the hunt. Its so thrilling when you finally catch that assshole whos been teabagging behind dropped pallets.  

It'll be hard at first don't get me wrong, but once you get the hang of the maps, or knowing the killers you play against, its fun. I still have moments with the killers (especially meyers, and the hag) of sheer terror when you get stalked between this little fking crack between a bus and tire stacks. Or the freaking popping up hag traps that litterally make me shake my mouse in sheer terror because of the jump terror factor. 

All im saying is Its definatley worth the play. Im glad I bought this game... My friends are too. So many memories and new friendships occured within this game and I never would have met them if I diddn't buy it.

So buy it!~

boil em mash em stick em on a hook

Horrible glitchy game with even worse devs. Get Friday the 13th.

This game has a horrible reputation of corrupting your save file (which is stored locally) and the devs know about it but refuse to do as much as place a warning on startup about it. Granted there are forum threads detailing the glitch, but the only solution the devs offer is to give you the amount of bloodpoints required to get back to your level (if you can provide evidence of your previous save).
This "solution", however, does not completely restore your character saves as the progression in the game is randomized, so you will end up with very different perks and, if you prestiged a character, will not be granted that progress back. Not to mention if you had even 1 level 50 character, you will be spending the better half of an hour working your way back up to level 50 just USING the bloodpoints they gave you.
If that doesnt suit your fancy but you REALLY want this game and are unfortunate enough to come across this glitch, do not attempt to change the SINGLE file stored locally that has all that data saved with no protection from changes. You will be unjustly banned and emailed a big "F--- you, hacking scum" by their PR team when you question it.
